message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CV. 

The paper is focused on developing a framework for automatically extracting task, dataset, metric, and score from NLP papers towards the automatic construction of leaderboards. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves machine learning techniques and evaluation metrics, which are relevant to sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions information retrieval (IR) and computer vision (CV) as potential areas where the framework could be applied, making cs.IR and cs.CV also likely sub-categories.
